data.name: Online Sparkler
data.detailed_description:
Online sparkler is a game to share "the time to look at the same fire".
Enjoy the communication between you and someone else through the sparklers, which light up differently depending on the weather at that moment!

▼Real-time weather conditions reflect real-world weather conditions
The weather in the game reflects the weather in the real world.
The sparklers glow differently depending on the sky conditions and temperature at the time.
(The weather may differ from the real world weather if the data was not taken properly.)


▼1~20 players
You can enjoy the healing power of staring into the fire quietly by yourself, chatting with family and friends with fireworks in hand, or spending time next to someone you don't know who just happened to show up.

▼Take a picture of your memories.
Fireworks will disappear, but you can take pictures to preserve your memories.
Keep them in a safe place or share them on SNS.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows8-64bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows8-64bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS Sierra - 10.12.6
  • Processor: 2.7 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS High Sierra - 10.13.1
  • Processor: 3.1 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
